content.title: Summary
content.content_html:
These plugins are built using the OpenLaw NZ API.

If you build something with our platform, get in touch and we'll list it here.

content.title: Use this plugin...
content.content_html: Use this plugin to find out how judges talk about a piece of legislation, and how it is applied in practice.

content.title: When looking at...
content.content_html: When looking at a section of legislation of legislation.govt.nz, this Chrome Extension inserts a button that, when clicked, will give you cases that refer to that section, and tell you how many times it is mentioned in each case.

content.title: It queries our database
content.content_html: It queries our database of 30,000 cases from 2004 onwards - and queries the data generated by our legislation algorithm.

content.title: The source code is on GitHub
content.content_html: The source code is on GitHub, if you'd like to improve or contribute.
